description: Column of Kempner tableau. There is a simple 2-D recurrence.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Viennot, G., Interpretations combinatoires des nombres d'Euler et de Genocchi. Seminar on Number Theory, 1981/1982, Exp. No. 11, 94 pp., Univ. Bordeaux I, Talence, 1982.
author: _Simon Plouffe_
